- requirements.txt, LICENSE, README.md (documentation)

Excluded:
- examples/ (example scripts)
- eval/ (evaluation code)
- scripts/ (utility scripts)
- download_data/ (data download scripts)
- tmp/ (temporary files)
- .git/ (version control)

Notes:
- This is the core GAM framework used by gam_agent.py
- Modified files: gam/agents/memory_agent.py, gam/agents/research_agent.py (async support)
